meanings.sent1: The king was throning on his golden seat.
meanings.sent2: She throned herself on the majestic throne.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was throning on the couch like a royal feline.
meanings.sent4: The sun throned in the sky, casting its warm light over the land.
meanings.sent5: The champion throned victorious, holding the trophy high.

meanings.definition: The act of placing on a throne.
meanings.sent1: The throning of the new queen was a grand ceremony.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the throning of the prince was a momentous occasion.
meanings.sent3: The throning of the cat as the household ruler was met with amusement.
meanings.sent4: The throning of the sun as the center of the solar system was a revolutionary idea.
meanings.sent5: The throning of the painting in the art gallery highlighted its importance.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming a ruler.
meanings.sent1: The throning of the young prince was a gradual process.
meanings.sent2: She observed the throning of the new leader with interest.
meanings.sent3: The throning of the cat as the household ruler was unexpected but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The throning of the sun as the dominant force in the sky was a natural progression.
meanings.sent5: The throning of the champion as the best in the world was a momentous event.
